title.narrative: To train farmers in impacted communities on weather changes vs farming seasons in Bayelsa State

description.narrative: CEHRD thought it necessary to enlighten the community members of Rivers and Bayelsa States on the basis of safeguarding their farm produces and viable solution of maintaining a balance nature through embedding of climate resilient crops and afforestation. The workshop was undertaken in Kporghor in Tai local government area of Rivers State and Agbura in Bayelsa State.
